DOC.brief_summary: A study test safety effect twice daily raltegravir diverse cohort patient currently infect human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , least 50 % African American least 25 % female , either receive antiretroviral drug .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Raltegravir Diverse Cohort HIV-Infected Patients ( 0518-055 )
DOC.criteria: Patient HIV positive Patient agree use ( partner use ) birth control define study doctor If female , pregnant breastfeeding Patient use investigational agent last 30 day Patient acute hepatitis Patient receive MK0518 ( raltegravir ) Patient use another experimental HIVintegrase inhibitor
